author: IGN
description: The free DLC, "Verso's Drafts" in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, comes with a bunch of new weapons and pictos, and one of the party members that benefits most from those new pieces of gear just happens to be Lune. If you want to turn Lune into a one woman Nevron obliterating machine, here's a guide on how to build her using the new Esquim weapon, along with a few other necessary pictos to deal millions upon millions points of damage.
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - How to Make an Unstoppable Lune Build in Verso's Drafts

author: IGN
description: We’ve pretty much wrapped up all our big reviews of the year, so let’s take a look at what were our most popular reviews in 2025. These are the top five IGN game reviews that got the most eyes on both ign.com and on our youtube channel. Did your favorite game make the cut?
title: The Top 5 Biggest IGN Game Reviews of 2025 - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Watch the latest Digimon Story: Time Stranger teaser trailer for this turn-based RPG to see what to expect with the Additional Digimon & Episode Pack 2: GAKU-RAN, which features new Mega Digivolution routes and an additional episode. The Additional Digimon & Episode Pack 2: GAKU-RAN will be available in January 2026. Digimon Story: Time Stranger is available now on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and Steam.
title: Digimon Story Time Stranger - Officia Episode Pack 2: GAKU-RAN Teaser Trailer

title: Bowen Yang and James Austin Johnson are true gamers #SNL

author: IGN
description:
Take a look ahead at what's coming in Season 2 of Fallout in this latest trailer for the series based on the iconic video game. Fallout Season 2 stars Ella Purnell, Aaron Moten, Walton Goggins, Kyle MacLachlan, Moisés Arias, and Frances Turner. Season 2 of Fallout is now streaming on Prime Video, with new episodes weekly.

The new season will pick up in the aftermath of Season One’s epic finale and take audiences along for a journey through the wasteland of the Mojave to the post-apocalyptic city of New Vegas.

Fallout is the story of haves and have-nots in a world in which there’s almost nothing left to have. 200 years after the apocalypse, the gentle denizens of luxury fallout shelters are forced to return to the incredibly complex, gleefully weird and highly violent universe waiting for them above.

Fallout is produced by Kilter Films, with executive producers Jonathan Nolan, Lisa Joy and Athena Wickham. Geneva Robertson-Dworet and Graham Wagner serve as executive producers, creato
title: Fallout: Season 2 - Official 'This Season On Fallout' Trailer (2025) Ella Purnell, Walton Goggins

author: IGN
description:
Watch the trailer for The Odyssey, an upcoming film starring Matt Damon, Tom Holland, Anne Hathaway, Robert Pattinson and Lupita Nyong’o, with Zendaya and Charlize Theron.

Christopher Nolan’s next film, The Odyssey, is a mythic action epic shot across the world using brand new IMAX film technology. The film brings Homer’s foundational saga to IMAX film screens for the first time and opens in theaters everywhere on July 17, 2026.

#IGN #Movies
title: The Odyssey - Official Trailer (2026) Matt Damon, Tom Holland, Anne Hathaway

author: IGN
description:
The Showdown Update for CarX Street brings long-awaited police pursuit gameplay in the form of online competitive PvP matches. Get ready to choose your side: be the racer or the cop - each with their own special abilities and objectives.

Escape the police through the streets of Sunset City using EMPs, or neutralize racers with special spike strips.

Experience CarX Street like never before with the new Showdown Update!

CarX Street is available on PC, Xbox, and Sony PlayStation.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1114150/CarX_Street/ 
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/carx-street/9NN082LMVV2C 
Sony PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10001917
title: CarX Street - Official Showdown Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
ARC Raiders launched in 1.0 this past October, but Embark Studios hasn’t slowed down since. This video breaks down everything that’s been added to the game since launch, from major content drops like the new Stella Montis map, deadly new ARC enemies, and the Aphelion weapon, to seasonal events, new quests, map conditions, and balance updates that continue to evolve the experience.

If you’re jumping back into ARC Raiders or want to know how the game has changed since release, this overview covers all post-launch updates, including North Line and Cold Snap content, community events, Raider Decks, new map modifiers like Snowfall and the Matriarch, and ongoing live-service improvements. Here’s everything added to ARC Raiders since launch and what it means for raiders heading back into the field.

00:00 - Intro
00:24 - New Map: Stella Montis
00:57 - New ARC
01:43 - New Weapon: The Aphelion
02:16 - Community Events
02:49 - New Map Conditions
03:44 - New Quests
04:10 - The Goalie Raider Dec
title: Arc Raiders: Everything Added Since Launch

author: IGN
description:
Watch a Warhammer 40,000 and Horus Heresy expert react and answer the biggest unsolved mysteries of Warhammer 40K! From answering whether or not the Emperor of Mankind could ever be resurrected, to breaking down the Legion of the Damned, to what the Alpha Legion is, and more! Arbitor Ian, our 40K lore master and expert, is here to answer all of your 40K grimdark iceberg questions and mysteries.

What is in the Dark Cells of Terra? Why was the Terminus Decree assigned to the Grey Knights? And just who are the Brain Boyz? Arbitor Ian is a Warhammer content creator with a focus on introducing 40K lore to newcomers and veterans alike.

00:00 - Intro
00:37 - What was the deal that the Emperor made with the Dark Gods on Molech?
02:43 - What happened to the two mission Primarchs and their Legions?
05:45 - Where did Constantin Valdor go? What is he up to?
07:17 - What is in the Dark Cells of Terra?
08:13 - Can the Emperor be resurrected?
10:56 - Why was the Terminus Decree assigned to the Gre
title: Warhammer 40,000 Expert's Theories About the Biggest Unsolved Mysteries of Warhammer 40K

author: IGN
description:
Octopath Traveler 0 reviewed by Michael Higham on Nintendo Switch 2. Also available on PlayStation 4/5, Xbox Series X|S, PC, and Nintendo Switch.

In this long review process, I was afforded the space to really reflect on my time with Octopath Traveler 0, and perhaps cool down from the adrenaline rush of finishing a massive RPG with a super tough final boss and multifaceted conclusion. What I realized in that time is that despite the bumps and low points across its 100-plus hour runtime, all its moving parts really mattered in some way or another. The more I examine the final hours in particular, the more impressed I am by how daring and poetic this game is – it's an affecting journey that you won't really feel until you're at the end of the road. In many ways, it's a quintessential RPG with a dynamic turn-based combat system, slick HD-2D style, powerful messages tucked in battles against gods, and magnificent music to match each moment. I don't expect everyone to give it the time it
title: Octopath Traveler 0 Review

author: IGN
description: Check out the Gameplay Trailer for They Will Come, an action-adventure steampunk horror game developed by Game Pop. Players will embody a young boy and his steampunk robots to explore environments, avoid enemies, and save the family that's been captured. Don't miss the latest trailer to see gameplay from They Will Come, launching in early 2026 for PC (Steam).
title: They Will Come - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: In the midst of war, a far more personal horror takes root at home. Your mother is becoming a monster. Survive, uncover the truth, and navigate a heartbreaking bond in this unique stop-motion narrative horror adventure. Mutter will be available on PC, and a demo is out now on Steam.
title: Mutter - Official Announce Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the Reveal Trailer for Westlanders, a Wild West open-world first-person action-adventure game developed by Radical Theory. Players will survive through the good and bad of 19th-century North America in the times of the roaring Wild West. Build villages, manage resources, and explore the lands alone or with friends in co-op. Westlanders is coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam), with a Kickstarter available now to support the development.
title: Westlanders - Official Reveal Trailer
